text:
Proclamation under the Biosecurity Act 2019

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Biosecurity Act 2019 fix 17 May 2023 as the day on which section 75 and section 282 of that Act and Parts 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7 of Schedule 3 to that Act commence.

8 May 2023

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JO PALMER

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 May 2023

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Natural Resources and Environment Tasmania.
